entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
